namesNumberOfCharactersDesc: Maximum number of characters to display for the node name. Leave empty to display the full name. Choose the character(s) that should be displayed if the name is truncated.
namesShowOnlyFileNameDesc: Show only the file name without the path
namesNoExtensionDesc: Remove the file extension from the name
namesUsePropertiesDesc: Use one of the desired properties as the node name instead of the filename
